document_data.name: Poisoner's Kit
document_data.mainbody: '''Poisoner's kit''' were collections of tools and supplies used in the creation and portioning of various toxins, venoms, and [[poison]]s.
document_data.Description: A typical poisoner's kit was a pouch filled with poisonous substances, plants, dust, and extracts, all to be used in the mixing of potent poisons. The kits also included measuring tools, such as [[spoon]]s and vials.{{Cite dragon/349/Poisonmaking Guide|87}}
document_data.Notable Users:
Poisoner's kit were commonly used by various [[rogue]]s and [[assassin]]s of the [[Realms]].

*[[Marliss]], a [[dark naga]] advisor of the [[half-fiend]] [[Kharantes]] in [[1375 DR]].
*[[Skrianna Shadowdusk]], a [[human]] [[wizard]] of [[Undermountain]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
*[[Undertow]], a [[locathah]] [[ranger]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
